Period - From: <% PRINT(dateFrom); %>     To: <% PRINT(dateTo); %>

Chat Uptake
<% var conversionSet = VALUE_SET( "Visitors and chats", "#", "Measurement", totalWebsiteVisitors, "1", "Website visitors", numChats, "1", "Website visitors who chatted to the CyberTwin", FORMAT_NUMBER(MULTIPLY(DIVIDE(numChats, totalWebsiteVisitors), "100"), "##.##"), "0", "Chat Uptake"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(conversionSet, tableSetTemplate1); %>
Engagement
<% var chatVolumeSet = VALUE_SET("Chat Volume", "#", "Measurement", numChats, "1", "Total Chats", numEngagingChats, "1", "Engaging Chats", FORMAT_NUMBER(MULTIPLY(DIVIDE(numEngagingChats, numChats),"100"),"##.##"), "0", "% Engaging Chats"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(chatVolumeSet, tableSetTemplate1); var timeChatsSet = VALUE_SET( "Chat Time", "#", "Measurement", CHATSTATS_TIME_AVG(), "1", "Avg minutes", CHATSTATS_TIME_MIN(), "1", "Min minutes", CHATSTATS_TIME_MAX(), "1", "Max minutes", CHATSTATS_TIME_MEDIAN(), "1", "Median minutes", CHATSTATS_TIME_TOTAL(), "1", "Total minutes"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(timeChatsSet, tableSetTemplate1); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(CHATSTATS_TIME_SPREAD("","%","Measurement"), "BAR", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate3); var msgChatsSet = VALUE_SET( "Chat Messages", "#", "Measurement", CHATSTATS_MSG_AVG(), "1", "Avg messages", CHATSTATS_MSG_MIN(), "1", "Min messages", CHATSTATS_MSG_MAX(), "1", "Max messages", CHATSTATS_MSG_MEDIAN(), "1", "Median messages", CHATSTATS_MSG_TOTAL(), "1", "Total messages"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(msgChatsSet, tableSetTemplate1); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(CHATSTATS_MSG_SPREAD("","%","Measurement"), "BAR", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate3); /* var chatDUSet = VALUE_SET( "Dinstinct Users", "#", "Measurement", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_NUM(), "1", "Num of distinct users", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_AVG(), "1", "Avg chats", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_MIN(), "1", "Min chats", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_MAX(), "1", "Max chats", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_MEDIAN(), "1", "Median chats", CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_TOTAL(), "1", "Total chats"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(chatDUSet, tableSetTemplate1); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(CHATSTATS_DISTINCTUSER_SPREAD("","%","Measurement"), "BAR", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate3); */ PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(CHATSTATS_LOCATION_SPREAD("Location","%","Measurement"), "BAR", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate3); %>
Feedback
<% var feedbackInfoSet = VALUE_SET("Feedback Info","","", FEEDBACK_NUM(),"1","Number of users who gave feedback"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(feedbackInfoSet, tableSetTemplate1); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(FEEDBACK_SET("1"), "BAR", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate3); %>
Deflection
<% var numFeedbackPhonedTheCallCentre = FEEDBACK_VALUE("2", "Phoned the call center"); var numFeedbackSentAnEmail = FEEDBACK_VALUE("2", "Send an email"); var sumFeedback = SUM(numFeedbackPhonedTheCallCentre, numFeedbackSentAnEmail); var normFeedback = DIVIDE(sumFeedback, FEEDBACK_NUM()); var percFeedback = MULTIPLY(normFeedback, "100"); var chatsDeflected = MULTIPLY(numChats, normFeedback); var savings = MULTIPLY(chatsDeflected, costPerContactCentreContact); var contactCentreSavingsSet = VALUE_SET( "Contact center savings with CyberTwin","","", numChats, "1", "Number of chats", percFeedback, "0", "% would have contacted the contact center", chatsDeflected, "1", "Chats deflected", costPerContactCentreContact, "5", "Cost per contact center contact", savings, "5", "Total Cost Deflected by CyberTwin"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(contactCentreSavingsSet, tableSetTemplate2); %>
Performance
Performance IndicatorCyberTwinLive Human ChatLive Human Phone
Accuracy - detecting questions<%PRINT_NUMBER(ACCURACY_RATE(),"##.#%");%>-68% customer satisfaction
Accuracy - giving correct answers100%60-75%81% first contact reolution rate
Quality answers - good substantive answers that represent the brand well and reduce calls to contact centre100%--
Consistent answers100%60%81% first contact reolution rate
Response time - per answer< 1 sec1-3 minutes62% in less than 10 sec
Length of chats - avg. time<%PRINT_NUMBER(CHATSTATS_TIME_AVG(),"##.#");%>mins--
Length of chats - avg. messages<%PRINT_NUMBER(CHATSTATS_MSG_AVG(),"##.#");%>msgs--
Chats cut short0%15%14% abandoned, 19% unresolved on first call
Abandoned calls0%14%
Agent utilisation100%, 24 hrs a day-59%
# Concurrent sessionsthousands per server1
Staff attrition0%-24%
/*

Overall Accuracy<%PRINT_NUMBER(ACCURACY_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
Direct Match Rate<%PRINT_NUMBER(DIRECT_MATCH_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
Direct Default Rate<%PRINT_NUMBER(DIRECT_DEFAULT_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
AutoLearn Rate<%PRINT_NUMBER(AUTOLEARN_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
AutoLearn Match Rate<%PRINT_NUMBER(AUTOLEARN_MATCH_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
AutoLearn Default Rate<%PRINT_NUMBER(AUTOLEARN_DEFAULT_RATE(),"##.#%");%>
*/
Learning About Users
<% var foldersSet = HIT_COUNT_TOP("FOLDER", topHitsNodeIdScope, numTopHits, "Most Popular Topics of Interest", "#", "Topic"); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(foldersSet, "PIE", "300", "300", tableSetGraphTemplate2); var questionSet = HIT_COUNT_TOP("INPUT", topHitsNodeIdScope, numTopHits, "Most Frequently Asked Questions", "#", "Question"); PRINT_TEMPLATE(questionSet, tableSetTemplate2); PRINT_TEMPLATE(SOURCE_CLICKS_TOP(numTopHits, "Pages From Which CyberTwin Was Opened", "%", "URL"), tableSetTemplate3); PRINT_TEMPLATE(PAGE_LOADS_TOP(numTopHits, "Pages Loaded By CyberTwin During Chat", "%", "URL"), tableSetTemplate3); %> <% PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(HITNODE_RULE_SETS(), "BAR", "300", "300", table3ColTemplateGraph1); PRINT_GRAPH_TEMPLATE(PROFILEVALUE_RULE_SETS(), "BAR", "300", "300", table3ColTemplateGraph1); %>
